title: For those left in Syria, life among the ruins takes on a ghostly air
text:
Published By: Baltimore Sun News - Today 
Talal Barazi is seated in the pleasant outdoor restaurant of a heavily guarded hotel in Homs, or what is left of it. "Basically, it's Berlin...
